welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Kingstown, known for its charming New England vibes and scenic views. We invite you to explore and enjoy all the delights this city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westerly State Airport serves domestic flights and includes all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Westerly State Airport serves international flights and includes customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Central Airport serves flights to and from various countries and provides customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Block Island Airport serves all incoming and outgoing flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
